faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our web development services.
faq.q1: How long does it take to build a website?
faq.a1: The timeline depends on the complexity of your project. A basic website typically takes 1-2 weeks, while more complex sites with custom features can take 4-8 weeks. We'll provide you with a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.
faq.q2: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
faq.a2: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages. This includes regular updates, security monitoring, backups, and technical support to ensure your website runs smoothly and stays secure.
faq.q3: Can you help with SEO and digital marketing?
faq.a3: We build all our websites with SEO best practices in mind. We also offer additional SEO services, content marketing, and digital advertising to help grow your online presence and drive more traffic to your site.
faq.a4: Yes, all our websites are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. We follow mobile-first design principles to ensure your site looks and works perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and desktops.
faq.q5: What if I need changes after the website is completed?
faq.a5: We include a revision period with every project, and we're always available for updates and modifications. We can also train you to make simple content updates yourself, or handle all changes for you through our maintenance services.
faq.q6: Do you work with existing websites or only build new ones?
faq.a6: We work with both! Whether you need a complete website redesign, want to add new features to an existing site, or need to migrate to a new platform, we can help improve and modernize your current web presence.
faq.a7: You only pay when our closers generate confirmed sales. We define validation criteria together and you only pay a commission on achieved results. No fixed costs, no salaries to pay.
faq.q8: How long does it take to see first results?
faq.a8: Generally, first results appear within 2-4 weeks after launch. Our experienced closers quickly adapt to your product and market to start generating sales rapidly.
faq.q9: Which sectors do you work in?
faq.a9: We work in all B2B and B2C sectors: SaaS, e-commerce, services, real estate, training, consulting, etc. Our closers are trained to adapt to different types of products and markets.
faq.q10: How do you guarantee the quality of your closers?
faq.a10: All our closers are selected according to strict criteria of experience and performance. They follow continuous training and are regularly evaluated. We only work with proven professionals.
faq.q11: Can I track performance in real-time?
faq.a11: Yes, you have access to a complete dashboard that allows you to track your closers' performance in real-time: number of calls, conversion rate, generated revenue, etc. Total transparency guaranteed.
faq.a12: Yes, we have closers in more than 15 countries and can operate in all international markets. Our teams master the cultural and commercial specificities of each region.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Learn about how Aress Technologies collects, uses, and protects your personal data
privacy.introduction:
Aress Technologies is committed to protecting the privacy and security of its users' personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, the conditions under which we share it, and users' rights regarding their data.

By accessing our website aress.cloud (hereinafter referred to as "the Site") or using our services, you accept the practices described in this policy.

section1.title: 1. Collection of personal data
section1.description: We collect different categories of personal data depending on your interaction with the Site:

subsection1.title: 1.1 Data you provide directly:
items: Registration information: Name, first name, email address, phone number, company name, password.
Transaction information: Billing address, payment details, transaction history.
Documents required for verification: Copies of identity documents or other identity proofs.

subsection2.title: 1.2 Data collected automatically:
items: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers.
Navigation data: Pages visited, time spent on the Site, interactions with content.
Cookies and similar technologies: See section 7 for more details.

subsection3.title: 1.3 Data from third parties:
subsection3.description: We may receive personal data about you via:
items: Business partners (e.g.: integration with third-party tools).
Identity verification services.
Publicly accessible databases or social networks if you interact with our pages.

section2.title: 2. Use of personal data
items: Provide our services: Create and manage your account, enable use of Site features, facilitate transactions between businesses and sales professionals.
Improve user experience: Personalize content and recommendations, analyze usage data to optimize our services.
Comply with our legal obligations: Identity verification, tax and regulatory compliance.
Communicate with you: Notifications about updates, security alerts, promotions or special offers.
Ensure security: Prevent fraud, secure transactions and detect unauthorized activities.

section3.title: 3. Sharing of personal data
section3.description: Your personal data will never be sold. We share your data only in the following circumstances:

subsection1.title: 3.1 With trusted third parties:
items: Service providers: Hosting, payment services, analytics tools, customer support.
Business partners: As part of collaborations to offer complementary services.

subsection2.title: 3.2 For legal reasons:
items: If required by law, court order or regulatory authority.
To protect our rights, prevent fraud or respond to disputes.

subsection3.title: 3.3 In case of structural change:
subsection3.description: If Aress Technologies is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, your data could be transferred to the new entity.

section4.title: 4. Data retention
section4.description: We retain your personal data as long as necessary to:
items: Provide our services.
Comply with our legal and contractual obligations.
Resolve disputes or enforce our rights.
section4.conclusion: Once these periods expire, your data will be deleted or anonymized.

section5.title: 5. User rights
section5.description: In compliance with Moroccan legislation (notably law n° 09-08) and GDPR if applicable, you have the following rights:
rights: Access: Request a copy of personal data held by Aress Technologies.
Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
Deletion: Request deletion of your data (except legal or contractual obligations).
Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
Opposition: Refuse processing of your data for direct marketing purposes.
Restriction: Temporarily limit processing of your data in certain circumstances.
section5.contact_info: To exercise your rights, contact us at: contact@aress.cloud.

section6.title: 6. Data security
section6.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against:
items: Unauthorized access.
Accidental loss or destruction.
Malicious acts (cyberattacks, hacking).
section6.conclusion: Our systems integrate encryption technologies, firewalls, and regular security audits.

section7.title: 7. Use of cookies
section7.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.

subsection1.title: 7.1 Types of cookies:
items: Essential: Necessary for proper Site functioning.
Analytics: To track Site performance and usage.
Marketing: To personalize advertisements and content.

subsection2.title: 7.2 Manage your preferences:
subsection2.description: You can configure your browser to refuse or limit cookie usage. However, this could affect certain Site functionalities.

section8.title: 8. International data transfer
section8.description: Your data may be transferred and stored outside Morocco, including in countries offering different levels of data protection. We ensure all transfers are governed by appropriate safeguards, in accordance with applicable laws.

section9.title: 9. User responsibilities
section9.description: As a user, you are responsible for:
items: Providing accurate and up-to-date information.
Protecting your login credentials and passwords.
Reporting any suspected fraudulent use of your account.

section10.title: 10. Privacy Policy modifications
section10.description: We reserve the right to modify this policy to reflect legal or operational changes. Any update will be published on this page with a revision date.

section11.title: 11. Contact us
section11.description: For any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:
contact_details: Postal address: Aress Technologies, 332 Bd Brahim Roudani, Maarif, Casablanca, Morocco.
section11.conclusion: This Privacy Policy reflects our commitment to respecting your data and ensuring complete transparency about its use.

closers.hero_description: Do the job you're passionate about, work according to your schedule and choose the missions that suit you.
closers.stats_description: Join the revolution, choose projects that excite you, make deals and earn commissions.
closers.step1_description: Create your account in just a few clicks and access the platform for free. Sign up with your personal information to get started.
closers.step2_description: Fill in your skills, experience and preferences to stand out to companies. A complete profile increases your chances of being selected.
closers.step3_description: Browse available missions (Projects) and select those that match your skills, availability and professional goals.
closers.step4_description: Join a project, start working at your own pace and make deals. Track your progress directly on the platform.
closers.step5_description: Once the deal is validated, quickly receive your payments with complete transparency. Your efforts are rewarded according to your performance.
closers.faq_a1:
Start by registering as a Closer by entering your email and password. Then, fill out your profile by adding your experiences, languages you speak and your weekly availability.

Once your profile is created and validated, complete the remaining information (e.g. 30-second presentation video).

📌 Note: The more complete your profile, the more chances you have of being accepted in several projects.
closers.faq_a2:
You are paid for each deal made, that is, for each result obtained.

💼 A deal can be:
✔️ A confirmed appointment
✔️ A completed sale
✔️ Any other commercial result requested

Payments are made by bank transfer to your account.
closers.faq_a3:
Payment for validated deals is made once a week, every Monday.

📅 You receive at the beginning of each week all commissions generated the previous week.
closers.faq_q4: 4. How can I be sure of being paid?
closers.faq_a4:
Aress only works with reliable companies.
A guarantee system ensures all commissions.

🔹 Blue badge "Guaranteed Commission": Aress has collected the commission in advance.
🔹 Projects without badge: Very low risk, but possible payment delay.

⚠️ In case of incident, Aress excludes the Business and finds an arrangement with the Closers.
closers.faq_q5: 5. Am I paid for hours worked?
closers.faq_a5:
❌ No, Aress operates on a results-based payment model.
You work as a freelancer: you use your means to provide results.

➡️ Each result provided is well compensated.
closers.faq_q6: 6. How much can I earn by making deals?
closers.faq_a6:
It depends on your commitment and projects.

📊 Goal: allow a full-time Closer to earn between 6,000 and 10,000 dirhams/month.

📈 Earning more or less depends only on you.
closers.faq_q7: 7. Do I have to pay anything to start on Aress?
closers.faq_a7:
💰 No, no payment is required.
✅ Registration is free.
✅ You can join as many projects as you want.

🚀 Join Aress now and start closing your first deals!
